item.title: O
item.description: score:47 Chances: Realty Income Corp. has had a nearly 6% dividend yield, making it an attractive investment for income-seeking investors. The stock has averaged 13.4% annual returns since its initial public offering, indicating strong performance over the years. The high-yielding dividend of Realty Income Corp.
